column1: No restrictions for indexing or serving (Equivalent to index, follow)
column2: No restrictions for indexing or serving (Equivalent to index, follow)

column2: Do not show this page in search results

column1: Configure meta robots directives per URL pattern. If multiple patterns match, highest priority wins.
column2: Configure meta robots directives per URL pattern. If multiple patterns match, highest priority wins.

column1: Add robots to '?p=' to paginated content
column2: Add robots to '?p=' to paginated content

column1: Select multiple directives to apply to pages with ?p= parameter.
column2: Select multiple directives to apply to pages with ?p= parameter.

column1: If enabled, the X-Robots-Tag header will mirror the robots meta tag directives from the site. If disabled, only the meta tag will be used.
column2: If enabled, the X-Robots-Tag header will mirror the robots meta tag directives from the site. If disabled, only the meta tag will be used.

column1: Configure X-Robots-Tag HTTP header per URL pattern. Supports bot-specific directives (e.g., googlebot: noindex).
column2: Configure X-Robots-Tag HTTP header per URL pattern. Supports bot-specific directives (e.g., googlebot: noindex).
